CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("http://localhost:47280/SalesforceAPI.aspx?UserAccount="& $User.Username &"&Destination="&Fax&"&AccountId="&Id,"Click here to call this account with 3CX (Fax)")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Clicking this link will launch a call to this account's fax and connect it to your phone
CustomField.label: Call fax via 3CX
